abstract: Exxon Mobil announced it would abandon a project to produce clean-burning diesel in partnership with Qatar’s state-run oil and gas company.
snippet: Exxon Mobil announced it would abandon a project to produce clean-burning diesel in partnership with Qatar’s state-run oil and gas company.
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON, Feb. 20  Exxon Mobil announced on Tuesday that it would abandon one of its biggest investments ever, a project with Qatar’s state-run oil and gas company to produce clean-burning diesel from natural gas.

headline.main: Exxon to Abandon a Big Investment in Qatar
headline.print_headline: Exxon to Abandon a Big Investment in Qatar
